title: azhagu kutty chellam lyrics Satham Podathey
stanzas:
azhagu kutty chellam
unnai alli thookkum podhu
un pinju viralgal modhi
naan nenjam udaindhu ponaen

aalai kadaththi pogum
un kanna kuzhiyin sirippil
virumbi maati kondaen
naan thirumbi poga maattaen

ammu nee en bommu nee
mammu nee en minmini

unakku therindha mozhiyilae
enakku paesa theriyalai
enakku therindha baashai paesa
unakku theriyavillai

irundhum nammakul
idhu enna pudhu pechchu
idhayam pesa
edharkindha aaraaichi

azhagu kutty chellam
unnai alli thookkum podhu
un pinju viralgal modhi
naan nenjam udaindhu ponaen

aalai kadaththi pogum
un kanna kuzhiyin sirippil
virumbi maati kondaen
naan thirumbi poga maattaen

roja poo kai rendum
kaattrodu kadhai paesum
un pinnazhagil pournamigal
thakka dhimmithaa jadhi paesum

endha neram oyaadha azhugai
yen indha muttikaal thozhugai
eppodhum ivan meedhu paal vaasanai
enna mozhi sindhikkum ivan yosanai

endha naattai pidiththu vittaan
ippadi ore raththina kaal
Thoranai thoranai

azhagu kutty chellam
unnai alli thookkum podhu
un pinju viralgal modhi
naan nenjam udaindhu ponaen

aalai kadaththi pogum
un kannak kuzhiyin sirippil
virumbi maatti kondaen
naan thirumbi poga maattaen

nee thindra mann saerththaal
veedondru kattidalaam
nee sinungum mozhi kaettaal
sangeedham katridalaam

thandavaalam illaadha rayilai
thavazhndhapadi nee oatti povaai
vambu gimbu seigindra polladhavan
kadavul pol kavalaigal illadhavan

olindhu olindhu pokku kaatti
odugindra kannannae
punnagai mannanae

azhagu kutty chellam
unnai alli thookkum podhu
un pinju viralgal modhi
naan nenjam udaindhu ponaen

aalai kadaththi pogum
un kanna kuzhiyin sirippil
virumbi maatti kondaen
naan thirumbi poga maattaen

ammu nee en bommu nee
mammu nee en minmini

unakku therindha mozhiyilae
enakku paesa theriyalai
enakku therindha baashai paesa
unakku theriyavillai

irundhum nammakul
idhu enna pudhu paechchu
idhayam paesa
edharkindha aaraaichi

azhagu kutty chellam
unnai alli thookkum podhu
un pinju viralgal modhi
naan nenjam udaindhu ponaen

aala kadaththi pogum
un kanna kuzhiyin sirippil
virumbi maatti kondaen
naan thirumbi poga maattaenÂ
